org.drip.execution.tradingtime

Packages that use org.drip.execution.tradingtime
Package Description

org.drip.execution.dynamics

org.drip.execution.tradingtime
Coordinated Variation Trading Time Models
  • Classes in org.drip.execution.tradingtime used by org.drip.execution.adaptive
    Class Description
    CoordinatedVariation
    CoordinatedVariation implements the Coordinated Variation of the Volatility and Liquidity as described in the "Trading Time" Model.

    CoordinatedVariation
    CoordinatedVariation implements the Coordinated Variation of the Volatility and Liquidity as described in the "Trading Time" Model.
